messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] before I start...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/2/00 7:21:54 AM US Mountain Standard Time, ... I vote separate em. I ll read em all, but it makes replying easier.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/2/00 7:21:54 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
tracy.oldfield@... writes:

> There are many things I'd like
> to reply to from these, so before Is tart, I just want to ask, should I
> send them all in one long email, or separate them out into what
> they're relevant to with appropriate headings, so that readers can
> exercise their power of choice <g>

I vote separate 'em. I'll read 'em all, but it makes replying easier.

:-) Diane

>they're relevant to with appropriate headings, so that readers can

Appropriate headings are definitely a good thing. I am more impressed if
you have the ability to make the headings and replies *after* deleting
that many different messages..

Vicki
